name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.pgpDecrypt
script:
start:
  return:
    snippet@text:
      decrypt.pgp/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        output: decrypted_message
        inputs:
          # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/commands/decrypt.pgp/
          # [TODO] Set `message:`
          #message: -----BEGIN PGP MESSAGE-----...
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
